posts.post_content: All prices include confirmed delivery via USPS. Im looking for T210/T209 in trade. Willing to give a discount on multiple card purchases. Thank you.
Sold two. Two left at friendly prices

Looking for the following if you have any (all are Charlotte cards and from Series 5): 

Any condition is acceptable. I have 6 of the 15 Charlotte cards and I'm trying to complete the Charlotte set (I live in Charlotte and collect Charlotte minor league baseball memorabilia).

1910 T210 Old Mill Charlotte Checklist
Brazell – Charlotte
Cross – Charlotte
Coutts – Charlotte
Dobard – Charlotte
Duvie – Charlotte
Hayes – Charlotte
Humphrey – Charlotte
Johnson – Charlotte
McHugh – Charlotte

Thank you,

Brett
